IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: HILLBROOK PROVIDES AN EXTRAORDINARY EDUCATIONAL EXPERIENCE (CONTINUED ON SCH. O)THAT FOSTERS A LOVE OF LEARNING IN OUR STUDENTS AND HELPS THEM DEVELOP THE KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS, AND CONFIDENCE TO ACHIEVE THEIR HIGHEST INDIVIDUAL POTENTIAL IN SCHOOL AND IN LIFE. AT HILLBROOK, STUDENTS ARE KNOWN, RESPECTED, AND VALUED AS INDIVIDUALS AND EVERY DAY IS A JOURNEY OF SELF-DISCOVERY, IMAGINATIVE THINKING, CREATIVE PROBLEM SOLVING, LAUGHTER, AND FRIENDSHIP.
IRS990.MissionDesc: HILLBROOK PROVIDES AN EXTRAORDINARY EDUCATIONAL EXPERIENCE THAT FOSTERS A LOVE OF LEARNING IN OUR STUDENTS AND HELPS THEM TO DEVELOP THE KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND CONFIDENCE TO ACHIEVE THEIR HIGHEST INDIVIDUAL POTENTIAL IN SCHOOL AND IN LIFE. (CONTINUED ON SCH. O)AT HILLBROOK, STUDENTS ARE KNOWN, RESPECTED, AND VALUED AS INDIVIDUALS AND EVERY DAY IS A JOURNEY OF SELF-DISCOVERY, IMAGINATIVE THINKING, CREATIVE PROBLEM SOLVING, LAUGHTER, AND FRIENDSHIP.
IRS990.Desc: HILLBROOK SCHOOL IS AN INDEPENDENT, NON-PROFIT ELEMENTARY SCHOOL THAT OPERATES A CO-EDUCATIONAL FACILITY THAT SERVES APPROXIMATELY 365 STUDENTS IN JK-8TH GRADE. HILLBROOK AIMS TO INSPIRE CHILDREN TO REACH THEIR HIGHEST INDIVIDUAL POTENTIAL AND TO REACH BEYOND THEMSELVES TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN THE WORLD. HILLBROOK GRADUATES ARE ADMITTED TO AND THRIVE AT THE TOP PRIVATE HIGH SCHOOLS IN THE COUNTRY.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.TitleTxt: HEAD OF MIDDLE SCHOOL & DIRECTOR OF DEI
DIRECTOR OF SCOTT CENTER FOR ENTR

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL'S ENDOWMENT IS USED TO SUPPORT ANNUAL UNRESTRICTED OPERATIONS, TUITION ASSISTANCE AND THE OPERATIONS OF THE SCOTT CENTER FOR ENTREPRENEURSHIP.

THE SCHOOL IS A QUALIFIED ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME AND CALIFORNIA FRANCHISE TAXES UNDER THE PROVISIONS OF SECTIONS 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND 23701(D) OF THE CALIFORNIA REVENUE AND TAXATION CODE, RESPECTIVELY. THE SCHOOL HAS EVALUATED ITS CURRENT TAX POSITIONS AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT AS OF JUNE 30, 2023 AND 2022, THE SCHOOL DOES NOT HAVE ANY SIGNIFICANT UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS FOR WHICH A RESERVE WOULD BE NECESSARY.
HILLBROOK SCHOOL'S RACIALLY NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY IS AVAILABLE AT ALL TIMES ON THE SCHOOL WEBSITE'S HOME PAGE.

FINANCIAL AID AT HILLBROOK IS BASED ENTIRELY ON NEED, DEFINED AS THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN A FAMILY'S RESOURCES AND A CHILD'S EDUCATIONAL EXPENSES. QUALIFICATION IS DETERMINED BY THE SCHOOL AND STUDENT SERVICE FOR FINANCIAL AID (SSS), A SERVICE OF THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS (NAIS), USED BY MORE THAN 2,400 K-12 SCHOOLS ACROSS THE COUNTRY. GRANTS ARE APPLIED TO THE STUDENT'S ACCOUNT, REDUCING THE AMOUNT DUE FOR TUITION.

RltdOrgOfficerTrstKeyEmplGrp.TitleTxt: HEAD OF MIDDLE SCHOOL & DIRECTOR OF
DIRECTOR OF SCOTT CENTER FOR ENTR

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MARK SILVER IS REQUIRED TO LIVE IN THE HOME FOR THE HEAD OF SCHOOL OWNED BY HILLBROOK SCHOOL PURSUANT TO HIS EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT. THE 2022 HOUSING BENEFIT OF $40,000 IS TAXABLE AND IS REFLECTED ON HIS W-2. DISCRETIONARY SPENDING IS AVAILABLE BUT NO AMOUNTS WERE EXPENDED IN FISCAL YEAR 2022-23. IF INCURRED, IT WOULD BE APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES CHAIR.

THE SCHOOL HAS A 457F PLAN FOR HEAD OF SCHOOL (HOS) AND CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER (CFO). DURING THE 2022 CALENDAR YEAR, $25,000 WAS ACCRUED FOR THE HOS AND $25,000 WAS ACCRUED FOR THE CFO. THE HOS RECEIVED $57,890 SECTION 457F VESTED DISTRIBUTION IN 2022 CALENDAR YEAR, WHICH WAS REPORTED AS DEFERRED COMPENSATION ON PRIOR FORM 990. THE AMOUNT WAS REPORTED ON SCHEDULE J, COLUMN B(III) AND COLUMN (F) AND WAS INCLUDED ON THE FORM W-2 AS WELL. THE CFO & COO RECEIVED $26,753 SECTION 457F VESTED DISTRIBUTION IN 2022 CALENDAR YEAR, WHICH WAS REPORTED AS DEFERRED COMPENSATION ON PRIOR FORM 990. THE AMOUNT WAS REPORTED ON SCHEDULE J, COLUMN B(III) AND COLUMN (F) AND WAS INCLUDED ON THE FORM W-2 AS WELL.
THIS NUMBER REPRESENTS THE NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTORS, NOT THE NUMBER OF ITEMS CONTRIBUTED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN APRIL 2023, THE ORGANIZATION UPDATED ITS BYLAWS. THE BOARD SHALL NOW CONSIST OF NO LESS THAN FIVE AND NO MORE THAN TWENTY-TWO BOARD VOTING BOARD MEMBERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FINANCE COMMITTEE MEMBERS (WHICH INCLUDES THE AUDIT COMMITTEE CHAIR) REVIEW AND APPROVE THE COMPLETED FORM 990. THE CHAIR OF THE FINANCE COMMITTEE EMAILS ALL OTHER CURRENT TRUSTEES STATING THAT THE COMPLETED FORM 990 IS AVAILABLE FOR REVIEW ON THE SECURE BOARD OF TRUSTEES WEBSITE PORTAL. SCHEDULE B IS REDACTED FROM THE FORM 990 DURING REVIEW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANNUALLY, THE PRESIDENT OF THE BOARD OR HIS NOMINEE SHALL SUBMIT TO EACH TRUSTEE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE STATEMENT DESIGNED TO DISCLOSE ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST WHICH A TRUSTEE MAY HAVE IN THE PERFORMANCE OF HIS OR HER DUTIES TO THE SCHOOL. ADDITIONALLY, ALL TRUSTEES OR MEMBERS OF COMMITTEES OF THE BOARD SHALL HAVE THE AFFIRMATIVE DUTY TO ADVISE THE BOARD OR ANY COMMITTEE IN SESSION, OF ANY POSSIBLE CONFLICT OF INTEREST REGARDING A PARTICULAR SUBJECT BEFORE DEBATE THEREOF AND ABSTAIN FROM VOTING ON THAT SUBJECT. THE PARTICULARS OF SUCH RESPONSE SHALL BE RECORDED AS PART OF THE MINUTES. FAILURE TO EXECUTE THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE STATEMENT WITHIN 30 DAYS OF RECEIPT, THEREOF, SHALL BE CAUSE FOR REMOVAL FROM THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE HEAD OF SCHOOL'S COMPENSATION IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE BOARD'S COMPENSATION COMMITTEE USING COMPARABILITY DATA. THIS PROCESS IS DOCUMENTED IN THE BOARD'S MINUTES. THE CFO'S COMPENSATION IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE HEAD OF SCHOOL USING THE SAME PROCESS AS DESCRIBED ABOVE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL MAKES THESE DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
